course.title: ADM 4396 Seminar in Administration (3 units)
course.desc: The seminars will focus on issues in administrative studies. The focus of these seminars should be expected to change from year to year.Course Component: SeminarPrerequisites : All 2000 level B. Com common core courses. This course is reserved students enrolled : to the B.Com who have completed at least 33 course units from the common core courses, including ADM 2381; to minors where the course is required.
